chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
T0: Type

Goal:
forall (f : T0 -> T -> T) (x0 : T) (s : seq T0) (t : T0), foldr f x0 (rcons s t) = foldr f (f t x0) s

Premises:
Notation seq := list
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
foldr = fun (T R : Type) (f : T -> R -> R) (z0 : R) => fix foldr (s : seq T) : R := match s with | [::] => z0 | x :: s' => f x (foldr s') end : forall T R : Type, (T -> R -> R) -> R -> seq T -> R Arguments T, R are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ seq_scope]
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
rcons = fun T : Type => fix rcons (s : seq T) (z : T) {struct s} : seq T := match s with | [::] => [:: z] | x :: s' => x :: rcons s' z end : forall T : Type, seq T -> T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope _]
foldl_rev : forall (T R : Type) (f : R -> T -> R) (z : R) (s : seq T), foldl f z (rev s) = foldr (fun (x : T) (z0 : R) => f z0 x) z s
foldr_cat : forall (T2 R : Type) (f : T2 -> R -> R) (z0 : R) (s1 s2 : seq T2), foldr f z0 (s1 ++ s2) = foldr f (foldr f z0 s2) s1
foldr_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (h : T1 -> T2) (R : Type) (f : T2 -> R -> R) (z0 : R) (s : seq T1), foldr f z0 [seq h i | i <- s] = foldr (fun (x : T1) (z : R) => f (h x) z) z0 s
zip_rcons : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T) (x : S) (y : T), size s = size t -> zip (rcons s x) (rcons t y) = rcons (zip s t) (x, y)
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)
last_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (x : T1), last (f x) [seq f i | i <- s] = f (last x s)
map_rcons : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (x : T1), [seq f i | i <- rcons s x] = rcons [seq f i | i <- s] (f x)
unzip1_zip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), ssrnat.leq (size s) (size t) -> unzip1 (zip s t) = s
List.find_none : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : seq A), List.find f l = None -> forall x : A, List.In x l -> f x = false
List.map_nth : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : seq A) (d : A) (n : nat), List.nth n (List.map f l) (f d) = f (List.nth n l d)
rcons_dec : forall P : seq ?T -> Type, P [::] -> (forall (s : seq ?T) (t : ?T), P (rcons s t)) -> forall s : seq ?T, P s where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type |- Type]
rcons_ind : forall P : seq ?T -> Type, P [::] -> (forall (s : seq ?T) (t : ?T), P s -> P (rcons s t)) -> forall s : seq ?T, P s where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type |- Type]
flatten = fun T : Type => foldr cat [::] : forall T : Type, seq (seq T) -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope]
List.forallb_forall : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : seq A), List.forallb f l = true < -> (forall x : A, List.In x l -> f x = true)
ssrfun.can_inj : forall (rT aT : Type) (f : aT -> rT) (g : rT -> aT), ssrfun.cancel f g -> ssrfun.injective f
List.map_eq_nil : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : seq A), List.map f l = [::] -> l = [::]
SetoidList.filter_InA : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (f : A -> bool), Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eqA eq) f -> forall (l : seq A) (x : A), SetoidList.InA eqA x (List.filter f l) < -> SetoidList.InA eqA x l /\ f x = true
eqtype.can_eq : forall (aT rT : eqtype.Equality.type) (f : eqtype.Equality.sort aT -> eqtype.Equality.sort rT) (g : eqtype.Equality.sort rT -> eqtype.Equality.sort aT), ssrfun.cancel f g -> forall x y : eqtype.Equality.sort aT, eqtype.eq_op (f x) (f y) = eqtype.eq_op x y
List.filter_In : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (x : A) (l : seq A), List.In x (List.filter f l) < -> List.In x l /\ f x = true
nth_behead : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (n : nat), nth x0 (behead s) n = nth x0 s (S n)
List.partition_inv_nil : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : seq A), List.partition f l = ([::], [::]) < -> l = [::]
head = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: _ => x end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
size_rcons_pos : forall (s : seq ?T) (t : ?T), (0 < size (rcons s t))%nat where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type |- Type]
map_cat : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s1 s2 : seq T1), [seq f i | i <- s1 ++ s2] = [seq f i | i <- s1] ++ [seq f i | i <- s2]
take_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (n : nat) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> take (S n) s = rcons (take n s) (nth x0 s n)

```coq
intros f x0 s t.
rewrite foldr_cat.
replace (foldr f (f t x0) s) with (foldr f x0 (rcons s t)).
- reflexivity.
- rewrite foldr_rcons.
  reflexivity.
Qed.
```
